hero.title: An AI Team Estimates Your Project More Accurately Than You — in 2 Minutes
hero.description: 8 specialized agents work like a senior team: Engineer evaluates code, Designer evaluates UX, PM evaluates business logic, Analyst evaluates risks. Through interactive questioning, they build a comprehensive estimate in ~30 minutes.

problems.title: Why Project Estimation Is Painful
problems.description: You're not alone. Most developers and teams struggle with accurate project estimation.

items.title: Fear of Estimation
items.quote: I'm afraid to underestimate and lose money. Afraid to overestimate and lose the client.

items.title: Time Consuming
items.quote: Every lead requires a meeting with 5 experts. We spend $1000+ just on estimation.

items.title: No Second Opinion
items.quote: Even with experience, sometimes you need a fresh perspective on complex projects.

comparison.title: Why ChatGPT and Manual Estimates Don't Work
comparison.description: Traditional methods fail because they lack specialization and depth

items.result: Doesn't account for UX, risks, integrations

solution.title: Multi-Agent AI Team Works Like Senior Professionals
solution.description: Why is a team better than a single model? Because each agent is an expert in their area. They discuss the project and find risks you might have missed.

agents.name: Product Manager AI
agents.detail: Breaks down projects into epics and user stories

agents.name: Senior Engineer AI
agents.detail: Identifies potential bottlenecks and tech debt

agents.name: UX Designer AI
agents.role: Maps user flow impact, counts screens

process.title: How the AI Team Works

steps.title: Deep Dive
steps.description: Each agent drills into their domain

process.footer: Average time: ~30 minutes (varies by project complexity)

comparisonExample.title: Compare ChatGPT vs EstimateFast
comparisonExample.description: See the difference in depth and accuracy

chatgpt.title: ChatGPT
chatgpt.subtitle: Single model response
chatgpt.responseText: "Such an app will take approximately 4-6 months with a team of 3-4 people. Cost: $80,000 - $120,000."

estimateFast.title: EstimateFast
estimateFast.subtitle: Multi-agent analysis
estimateFast.footer: See the difference? Try EstimateFast for free

testimonials.title: What Users Say About EstimateFast
testimonials.description: Real stories from developers and teams

items.name: Alex K.
items.text: I used to spend 3-5 hours on each estimate and still worried if I calculated correctly. EstimateFast gives me confidence in 2 minutes. My income grew by 40%.

items.name: Dmitry S.
items.text: We're an outsource studio. We used to call a meeting for every lead. Now EstimateFast gives the initial estimate, team verifies in 15 minutes. Saving 40 hours per month.

items.name: Maria L.
items.text: As a junior developer, I was always afraid to give estimates. EstimateFast is like a mentor always by my side. I see how senior experts think and learn.

items.q: How accurate is the AI team estimation?
items.a: EstimateFast delivers ±15% accuracy, which is better than most manual estimates (±50%). We analyze 10,000+ projects to calibrate our models.

items.q: Why is EstimateFast better than ChatGPT?
items.a: ChatGPT is a single model without specialization. EstimateFast is a team of 8 agents where each is an expert in their area. Result: detailed backlog instead of a general number.
Yes! Every task is detailed and can be changed, deleted, or added. Export to Jira/Linear/Notion is fully supported.

items.q: How fast will I get my estimate?
items.a: Basic: 24 hours, Pro: 12 hours, Enterprise: 6 hours. The brief itself takes just 2 minutes to complete.
No! For the test (5 questions) registration is not required. For the full estimate, we only need your email.

items.q: What types of projects can be estimated?
items.a: Any digital projects: web applications, mobile apps, SaaS platforms, e-commerce, CRM/ERP systems, and more.

cta.title: Stop Losing Money on Inaccurate Estimates
cta.description: An AI team of experts will estimate your project more accurately than you — in 2 minutes.

footer.copyright: © 2025 EstimateFast. Made with AI ❤️ for humans

quiz.processing: Got it — the AI team is analyzing your input…

questions.title: How often do your project estimates turn out accurate?
questions.helper: Be honest — this helps us calibrate the AI team for your reality

options.label: About half the time — coin flip

questions.title: Think of the last project where your estimate was way off. What went wrong?
questions.helper: Specific failures reveal patterns we can fix with AI

options.label: Client hid key requirements until later
Tech turned out way more complex
Team velocity was slower than expected
I just didn't factor in enough unknowns

questions.title: When timelines start to slip, what do you feel first?
questions.helper: Emotional reactions reveal decision patterns under uncertainty

options.label: Calm — we'll just recalc and move on

questions.title: What blocks accurate estimates most often?
What happens when you deliver an estimate that turns out wrong?
questions.helper: Understanding consequences helps us prioritize the right AI safeguards

questions.title: What have you tried to improve estimation accuracy?
questions.helper: Knowing what hasn't worked helps us avoid repeating it

options.label: Read books / took courses on estimation
Got more people involved in estimating

questions.title: What matters most in your ideal estimate?
questions.helper: Trade-off between speed, accuracy, persuasion, and protection

options.label: Speed — give a solid ballpark fast
Accuracy — I'd rather take longer and be precise

questions.title: With an AI expert team at your fingertips, what would you delegate first?
questions.helper: Reveals your highest-tension area and AI agent priority

visionary.title: The Visionary
visionary.summary: Fast, big-picture, intuition-driven. Great at momentum, weaker at risk granularity.
pain_points: Clients complain estimates are too optimistic
Teams struggle to deliver on time

analyst.title: The Analyst
analyst.summary: Data-driven, precise, and structured. May overanalyze and slow decisions.
pain_points: Spend too much time on estimates
Miss opportunities due to slow response

negotiator.title: The Negotiator
negotiator.summary: Stakeholder-oriented, consensus builder. Needs stronger technical grounding.
pain_points: Struggle to defend numbers under pressure

protector.title: The Protector
protector.summary: Reliability and buffers first. Safeguards team, may over-pad and slow delivery.
pain_points: Lose deals to competitors with lower estimates

heroSection.title: Get your project estimated by a full AI team
